titles.title: Glory, Glory, Hallelujah Since I've Been Born Again

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Glory, glory, hallelujah since I've been born again.
I've received the revelation of how I can conquer sin.
I don't have to live in bondage to the devil anymore.
I'll walk perfect in His likeness as His Body is restored.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I'm on the road to glory I can see the world below.
I know I'm getting stronger I can feel it in my soul.
I believe the Word I'm hearing cause I know it's from the Lord.
I'll walk perfect in His likeness as His Body is restored.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Don't you see the City spotless and restored in full array.
Each golden bar tall and erect standing in it's place.
Joined by the golden bars of truth His nature to proclaim.
Walk on into the land, walk on His creation to reclaim.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
The visions' getting stronger: I can see it more each day.
The glory's getting brighter as the incense burns away.
I'm going on. I'm going on. No one can stop me now.
His nature's coming forth in me.
Through your love and His power.
